recipe.title: Sweet Chile Dipping Sauce
ingredients: 1/2 teaspoon sambal oelek (chile garlic sauce) or 1/2 teaspoon dried hot red pepper flakes
instructions: Bring water and sugar to a boil in a small saucepan over moderate heat, stirring until sugar is dissolved. Remove from heat and stir in rice vinegar, salt, and sambal oelek. Cool sauce, then chill, covered, at least 1 hour.
